wordGroup: breakthrough point 突破点；穿透点；贯穿点
make a breakthrough 有重大发展或突破

sentences.en: God willing, there will be a breakthrough.
sentences.cn: 天公作美的话，会有所突破。

sentences.en: This discovery was perceived as a major breakthrough.
sentences.cn: 这一发现被视为一项重大突破。

sentences.en: They announced, amid much ballyhoo, that they had made a breakthrough.
sentences.cn: 他们在一片喧嚣中宣布，他们取得突破性的进展。
